name: Poppy Kart 2
description:
Poppy Kart 2 is a galactic racing game in a pixelated world!

- Poppy and his friends are back: they traded their karts for spaceships to find Froggy who ran away again!
- Enjoy 28 progressive races including bonus levels as fun as raging with catchy music and funny sound effects.

New weapon: the teleporter can change your position on the circuit for even more laughs!
